CustomField.formula: Ship_Method__c == 'WI' || Ship_Method__c = 'PU' || Ship_Method__c = 'PSL' || Ship_Method__c = 'PC' || Ship_Method__c = 'PCG' || Ship_Method__c = 'PUC'
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates if the customer is walk-in by the GP/Salespad default Ship Method
CustomField.label: Walk-In Customer?
